Name: Githyanki Warrior
Traits: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics). The githyanki's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)3/day each: jump, misty step, nondetection (self only)
Actions: Multiattack. The githyanki makes two greatsword attacks. Greatsword. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage.
